General.Name: Era Graharealty PT Tbk
General.Description: PT Era Graharealty Tbk provides property brokerage services in Indonesia. It engages in the property agency, franchise, royalty, management fee, and commission activities. The company was incorporated in 1991 and is headquartered in Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia. PT Era Graharealty Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Realti Indo Mandiri. PT Era Graharealty Tbk is a subsidiary of APAC Investment 2 Pte Ltd.
General.Address: TCC Batavia Tower One, Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia, 10220
